# mb-progress-tracker



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                             | Type     | Default |
| --------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `current` | `current` | Current step.  Steps start from 1 up to the size number.  Default is 1. | `number` | `1`     |
| `size`    | `size`    | Steps count.  Default is 3.                                             | `number` | `3`     |


## Dependencies

### Used by

 - [mb-help](../mb-help)

```mermaid
graph TD;
  mb-help --> mb-progress-tracker
  style mb-progress-tracker fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
```
